skillTree.localised_description: The shadow of the Ruinous Powers looms large, protecting those who bear their mark.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say noâ€¦

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.
The desire to wreak havoc is innate, brought about not by choice but by sheer force of being.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
It is never enough. The food, the drink, the slaughter. It is never, ever enough.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
The weird, evil moon hangs low in the sky, drawing reverence from its abominable worshippers.
Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 3%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 6%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 9%

skillTree.localised_description: Through ancient chants, the Skald extends the reach of his inspiring melodies, ensuring no warrior is beyond the call to battle.

effects.description: Effect range: +50% for Skald inspiring abilities

ui_effects.localised_text: Mutually exclusive with other Skald inspiring abilities
Mutually exclusive with other Skald inspiring abilities
Mutually exclusive with other Skald inspiring abilities

effects.description: Effect range: +75% for Skald inspiring abilities

ui_effects.localised_text: Mutually exclusive with other Skald inspiring abilities
Mutually exclusive with other Skald inspiring abilities
Mutually exclusive with other Skald inspiring abilities

effects.description: Effect range: +100% for Skald inspiring abilities

ui_effects.localised_text: Mutually exclusive with other Skald inspiring abilities
Mutually exclusive with other Skald inspiring abilities
Mutually exclusive with other Skald inspiring abilities

skillTree.localised_description: The Skald's horn summons forth a raging tempest of fury, driving allies into a berserk frenzy, and striking fear into the hearts of their enemies.

ui_effects.localised_text: Mutually exclusive with other Skald inspiring abilities

skillTree.localised_description: Blasts of the horn stir the fury within Norscan warriors, driving them to greater feats of strength and savagery.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with each nearby entity death.

skillTree.localised_description: Skalds serve in the High King's Great Hall as chronicler, entertainer, warrior. Yet their ability to invigorate troops with knowledge over the finest brews is lesser known.
The many saga's that the Skald orates tell tales of legendary battles and hardened warriors, their words resonate and perhaps merely perceptively - increase the damage done by the Norscan retinue.

effects.description: Sharpen Weapons action: missile and melee damage is increased by an additional 1%
Sharpen Weapons action: missile and melee damage is increased by an additional 3%
Sharpen Weapons action: missile and melee damage is increased by an additional 5%

skillTree.localised_description: Such magic-users may be wise and able to offer sage advice, especially if they have scried the region.

effects.description: Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 2%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 4%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 6%

skillTree.localised_description: They cannot stop what they cannot see.

effects.description: Damage Walls action: 1 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 2 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 3 additional wall breaches

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
The sight of a powerful figure extolling death and blasphemies can bring enemy ranks to their knees.

effects.description: Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -10%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -20%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -40%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with time spent engaged in melee.
Mutually exclusive with other Skald inspiring abilities
Mutually exclusive with other Skald inspiring abilities

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Oh, horrific wonder! Vile awe! Such hateful majesty!
Being fleet of foot is useful in a fightâ€¦ or when trying to get away afterwards!

related_attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +10%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

related_attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.
Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.
Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.
If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.
Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
Well built, robust. Powerful.
If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.
This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.
Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.
An assured air instils great confidence in your followers.
Such an ugly scar is always memorable.
Clearly a veteran of some heroic deed.
Skulk and sneak or shadow and stalk, theirs is a guileful nature.
Shares the intellect of a River Troll.
Others may call it decisive, but being uncompromising can be a weakness as well as a strength.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +10% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Oh, horrific wonder! Vile awe! Such hateful majesty!
